tool.name: IDMassAccuracy
tool.description: Calculates a distribution of the mass error from given mass spectra and IDs.
tool.command:
IDMassAccuracy
-in #for token in $param_in: $token #end for -id_in #for token in $param_id_in: $token #end for #if $param_precursor_out: -precursor_out $param_precursor_out #end if
#if $rep_param_precursor_columns: -precursor_columns #for token in $rep_param_precursor_columns: #if " " in str(token): "$token.param_precursor_columns" #else $token.param_precursor_columns #end if #end for #end if #if $param_precursor_error_ppm: -precursor_error_ppm #end if #if $param_fragment_out: -fragment_out $param_fragment_out #end if
#if $rep_param_fragment_columns: -fragment_columns #for token in $rep_param_fragment_columns: #if " " in str(token): "$token.param_fragment_columns" #else $token.param_fragment_columns #end if #end for #end if #if $param_fragment_error_ppm: -fragment_error_ppm #end if #if $param_fragment_mass_tolerance: -fragment_mass_tolerance $param_fragment_mass_tolerance #end if #if $param_separator: -separator "$param_separator" #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_number_of_bins: -number_of_bins $adv_opts.param_number_of_bins #end if #if $adv_opts.param_generate_gnuplot_scripts: -generate_gnuplot_scripts #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #end if

param.name: param_in
param.label: Input mzML file list, containing the spectra

param.name: param_id_in
param.label: Input idXML file list, containing the identifications

param.name: param_precursor_columns
param.label: Columns which will be written to the output file

param.name: param_precursor_error_ppm
param.label: If this flag is used, the precursor mass tolerances are estimated in ppm instead of Da

param.name: param_fragment_columns
param.label: Columns which will be written to the output file

param.name: param_fragment_error_ppm
param.label: If this flag is used, the fragment mass tolerances are estimated in ppm instead of Da

param.name: param_fragment_mass_tolerance
param.label: Maximal fragment mass tolerance which is allowed for MS/MS spectra, used for the calculation of matching ions

param.name: param_separator
param.label: character which should be used to separate the columns in the output files

param.name: param_number_of_bins
param.label: Number of bins that should be used to calculate the histograms for the fitting

param.name: param_generate_gnuplot_scripts
param.label: If this option is set to true, the distributions and the fits are used to generate a gnuplot script, that can be used to generate plots
param.help: (-generate_gnuplot_scripts) The options 'precursor_out' and 'fragment_out' must be set to take this effect

tool.help:
Calculates a distribution of the mass error from given mass spectra and IDs.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/UTILS_IDMassAccuracy.html
